summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 1500. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WATER PENETRATED THE FRONT PASSENGER FLOORBOARD WHEN IT RAINED OR WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN THROUGH A CAR WASH. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE CHEVROLET DEALER (LOCATED AT 128 DERBY STREET HINGHAM, MA 02043 PHONE (781) 749-1950) SEVERAL TIMES FOR THE FAILURE. THE DEALER REPLACED THE PASSENGER DOOR SEAL; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE WAS NOT CORRECTED AND WATER CONTINUED TO PENETRATE THE FRONT PASSENGER FLOORBOARD. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 32,235.
